title: Using Chrome's accessibility APIs to find security bugs
summary:
Posted by Adrian Taylor, Security Engineer, Chrome





Chrome’s user interface (UI) code is complex, and sometimes has bugs.

title: AI for Cybersecurity: Get Started Today
summary: This talk examine current real-world examples of AI-driven attacks and explore which defensive AI capabilities are available today.

title: AI Security: Top 5 Recommendations To Get Started Today
summary: Start securing your AI workflows against risks such as PII leaks, hallucinations, and prompt injection using our top 5 recommendations.

title: HTB Account: one account to rule them all
summary: Learn how to create and use HTB Account to simplify your login experience.

title: Critical vulnerabilities in Palo Alto Expedition: everything you need to know
summary: Detect and mitigate critical vulnerabilities (CVE-2024-9463, CVE-2024-9464, CVE-2024-9465, CVE-2024-9466, CVE-2024-9467) in Palo Alto Networks’ Expedition tool.
